GeneDef.label: void voice
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have something mysterious in their voice. Their voice penetrates into the back of the mind of the interlocutor and sows the seed of void in it.

customEffectDescriptions.li: When <color=#8a8ae6>interacting</color>, it has a chance to <color=#ff8585>inhumanize</color> the target.
